message.content:
Breakfast options:
- Oatmeal with fruit (berries, apples, pears) and nuts/seeds (sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, chia seeds, flax seeds, hemp seeds)
- Smoothie with non-dairy milk, frozen berries, banana, spinach, and protein powder (hemp, pea, soy, etc.)
- Eggs (scrambled, fried, poached) with vegetables (spinach, mushrooms, bell pepper) and fruit on the side

Lunch options:
- Vegetable soup or stew with beans/lentils and rice or quinoa
- Salad with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumber, olives, peppers, avocado, carrots, and seeds (sunflower, pumpkin, chia, hemp)
- Sandwich with vegan meat alternatives (tofurky, tempeh, seitan) on gluten-free bread or lettuce wraps, with vegetables and hummus or pesto

Snack options:
- Fruit (apple, pear, berries) with nuts/seeds (pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds, hemp seeds)
- Veggie chips (kale, sweet potato, parsnips, beet root) with hummus or pesto dip
- Rice cakes with nut butter (almond, cashew, sunflower seed, pumpkin seed) and berries

Dinner options:
- Stir-fry with mixed vegetables (broccoli, snow peas, mushrooms, bell pepper), tofu or tempeh, rice noodles, and sauce (teriyaki, peanut, soy, etc.)
- Veggie burger (black bean, quinoa, lentil) on a bun with vegetables and hummus or pesto
- Vegetable curry with tofu or tempeh, brown rice, and cauliflower rice
- Shepherd's pie with vegan meat alternatives (tofurky, tempeh, seitan), mashed potatoes, vegetables, and gravy

These are just some ideas for a healthy meal plan without dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews. You can mix and match these options to create different meals throughout the day.
